txt.en: Geralht and his ragtag band of Dunlending recruits have been defeated.
Geralht is taking his fresh Dunlending recruits on their first scouting mission along the eastern plains of the Stonedeans.
Defeating Geralht will impact the training of any new Dunlending recruits within Madh-fushaum, as he was an astute instructor in matters of war.
Geralht is taking his fresh Dunlending recruits on their first scouting mission along the eastern plains of the Stonedeans.
Geralht is a fierce warrior charged with training of new Dunlending recruits. He prepares them for the rigours of being a member of the White Hand army within Madh-fushaum.

Geralht leads a ragtag group of Dunlendings from Madh-fushaum on their first scouting mission. They can normally be seen watching the road south-east of Brockbridge and roaming around the south-eastern plains.
